articles.title: McDonald's flips golden arches in honor of International Women's Day
articles.description: For the first time in its history, the company has flipped its 'golden arches' logo to show a 'W' in honor of International Women's Day on Thursday, according to restaurant officials.

articles.title: Jet Airways, SpiceJet, AirAsia plan to add more jets in booming aviation market
articles.description: Indian airlines are scrambling to add more jets to meet demand for more domestic and international flights, making it one of the most targeted sales markets for jet manufacturers Airbus SE and Boeing Co.

articles.author: Kiran Rathee
articles.title: How Idea-Vodafone to be the biggest gainers from easier spectrum caps
articles.description: The overall spectrum holding limit for operators has been increased to 35 per cent from 25 per cent

articles.title: PNB Fraud Case: CBI Widens Probe Against Nirav Modi
articles.description: The Punjab National Bank has filed a new complaint against Nirav Modi, the diamond tycoon it has accused of being part of the fraud

articles.author: Alnoor Peermohamed
articles.title: Paytm's claim of leadership in UPI payments misleading, says PhonePe
articles.description: Says Paytm's high transaction volumes of low value indicative of discount heavy growth strategy

articles.author: Yunus Y. Lasania
articles.title: Japan eyes India to fill manpower gap in its information technology sector
articles.description: Japan is looking to collaborate with companies specifically from Hyderabad to fill  the manpower  gap in its information technology sector, JETRO’s Shigeki Maeda said

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: GTL Infra cuts outlook on Aircel bankruptcy filing
articles.description: Aircel filed for bankruptcy on March 1, and on Thursday its petition for insolvency was accepted by the NCLT.

articles.author: Veena Mani & Jyoti Mukul
articles.title: Corporate resolution: Larsen & Toubro moves NCLT against Bhushan Steel
articles.description: The move follows Tata Steel's announcement that it emerged as the highest bidder for the Delhi-based steel company, beating Sajjan Jindal-promoted JSW

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Indian economy will continue to have V-shaped recovery: Govt
articles.description: The first quarter (of FY18) was where the Indian economy bottomed out, and it is now seeing a very strong V-shaped recovery, says economic affairs secretary Subhash Chandra Garg

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Airports Authority of India chalks out Rs 180-bn capex plan for next 4 yrs
articles.description: RN Choubey also said the aviation sector in the country needs about 8,000 to 10,000 pilots during the next 5 to 6 years owing to the growth surge in the sector

articles.title: Jet Airways expects to close order for 75 narrow-body planes this month
articles.description: India Business News: In October last year, the airline's chairman Naresh Goyal had said that the carrier could purchase another 75 aircraft to help it expand in the fast g

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Royal Enfield forays into pre-owned motorcycle segment
articles.description: Chennai, Mar 8(PTI): Niche bike maker Royal Enfield today forayed into a pre-owned motorcycle segment with the launch
articles.urlToImage: Royal Enfield forays into pre-owned motorcycle segment

articles.author: ET Telecom
articles.title: NCLT clears Bharti Airtel's buyout of Telenor
articles.description: The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) on Thursday approved Bharti Airtel’s proposed merger with the Indian unit of Norway’s Telenor

articles.author: DIVYA RAJAGOPAL
articles.title: India Inc. has Rs 1.8 lakh crore cash trapped in their balance sheets: EY Report
articles.description: The cash conversion cycle has deteriorated by 4 percent from FY16, increasing by 44 days in FY17. Sector like Engineering, chemical and pharma have the longest cycle.

articles.title: Bandhan Bank to raise up to Rs 4473 crore in one of India's biggest banking sector IPOs
articles.description: The price band of the much-awaited IPO has been finalised at Rs 370-375 per share and the bid would remain open from March 15 to 19.

articles.author: FE Online
articles.title: Parliamentary panel, SBI flag concern over stressed power companies
articles.description: Amid the ongoing efforts for bank clean-up, stressed power companies, with about Rs 37,941 crore as NPA, are becoming a worry for the country.

articles.author: Lisa Du
articles.title: Coca-Cola bets alcohol is it for expanding Japanese drinks lineup
articles.description: Coca-Cola is launching a canned version of Chu-Hi, a carbonated drink made with shochu, a spirit distilled from barley, sweet potatoes or other ingredients

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Super rich Indians' love of stocks dwarfs rest of the world
articles.description: Indias ultra-wealthy population grew 18 per cent between 2016-2017.

articles.author: Gulveen Aulakh
articles.title: Bombay HC dismisses RCom's appeal against arbitration order barring asset sale
articles.description: According to lawyers present in the court room, the court dismissed all three appeals filed by Reliance Communications and its two companies.

articles.title: Closing Bell: Banks, RIL lift Sensex 318 pts, Nifty above 10200; market breadth weak
articles.description: Reliance Industries, HDFC, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Infosys and L&T rallied 1-2 percent.
